text: Karasawayama Shrine Affiliation: Shinto Deity: Fujiwara no Hidesato Karasawayama Shrine is a Beppyo shrine in Sano, Tochigi It is located on the former grounds of . The castle grounds including the shrine is a National historic site of Japan == References == Category:Beppyo shrines Category:Bekkaku kanpeisha Category:Shinto shrines in Tochigi Prefecture
title: Karasawayama Shrine
